resources.string: Hey there, I\'m Alex! I build Android apps in my spare time, because it\'s super fun and I love the Android community. That is why this app and all others I build are free and ad-free. If you have any ideas on how to make this app better, please send them my way! Anyways, I hope this app has been of use to you and has given you a bug-free experience. Cheers.
